participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, she enjoys exploring new games and often finds herself daydreaming.
participant_1.background: i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i am a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox. i hate school.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and easy-going, he loves to unwind after work with sports and music.
participant_2.background: i have been working since i was sixteen years old. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith. my favorite food is mexican food.
